io.cettia.asity.bridge.netty4

Class AsityServerCodec

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.netty.channel.ChannelHandlerAdapter
      • io.netty.channel.ChannelInboundHandlerAdapter
        • io.cettia.asity.bridge.netty4.AsityServerCodec
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ChannelHandler, ChannelInboundHandler

    public class AsityServerCodec
extends ChannelInboundHandlerAdapter
    ChannelHandler to process HttpRequest and HttpResponse into NettyServerHttpExchange and NettyServerWebSocket. When you configure handler, you must add HttpServerCodec in front of this handler. 

    
 ChannelPipeline pipeline = ch.pipeline();
 pipeline.addLast(new HttpServerCodec())
 .addLast(new AsityServerCodec() {
     @Override
     protected boolean accept(HttpRequest req) {
         return URI.create(req.getUri()).getPath().equals("/cettia");
     }
 }
 .onhttp(http -> {}).onwebsocket(ws -> {}));
    Author:
    Donghwan Kim
